issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Tooling
components.description: Items related to Alloy tooling and workflow

fields.description:
h5.Description

https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/918 was bad and was missing several requires, this was not exposed through either eslint or the tests although it should have been (and I should have realised how bad I borked anyways)

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build kitchensink-v2 with alloy 1.13.6 and sdk 7.5.0

h5.Actual

{code}
 ReferenceError: CU is not defined
{code}

h5.Expected

It should work
fields.summary: iOS: TabbedBar usage on lower than SDK 8 is broken

comments.body:
Verified the fix with CLI 7.0.10-master.5 having alloy 1.13.7.

Closing.
